s.text: The charitable explanation is that they're thinking short-term, hoping to energize their base and win extra congressional seats in the November elections.
Instead, they keep playing until they've lost everything.
You know the old joke: "Clinton's approval ratings are so high he's going to start dating again."
And the party most likely to be blamed is the one that controls Congress.
But Congress won't be able to impeach him if the Republican majority has squandered its authority by overplaying an arguably lesser scandal that most people think boils down to lying about sex.
